group_1.narration: Sakae Halloween Festa is a community driven event@organized by Sakae Comprehensive School.
I was so excited@to be an executive committee member,@but due to my hospitalization I had to decline.@It was so disappointing, but...
I got a call, saying@"Now that you're discharged, why not@come join us again?" straight from the@head of the committee herself!!

group_1.textLeft: ... You want me to adjust you a Halloween costume?

group_1.textRight: If you'd please, Coordinator!

group_1.textLeft: But Karin, aren't you always full of Halloween spirit?

group_1.textRight: That's different.
I'd like a costume to wear for the Halloween Festa!

group_1.textLeft: Halloween Festa...?
... So that's what this is about.

group_1.textRight: It's a festival I'm super attached to, so I want@to ensure the greatest success.
So to fire myself up to the max,
I want to show up in a special costume!
But I don't really want to just dress up in my@normal Magical Girl outfit
and call it a costume...

group_1.textLeft: It's really nothing like a costume.
... But anyways, what costume do you have in mind?
A vampire? ...Ghost?@Or perhaps a little devil?
I'll fill your costume with Halloween spirit to your heart's content!

group_1.textRight: I'd like to ask for the Pumpking.

group_1.textLeft: ... Pumpking?

group_1.textRight: You got it!
The protector of Halloween, the kind-hearted@King of Pumpkins!

group_1.textLeft: Pumpkin King...@Did you have any particular image in mind?
Like having a jack-o'-lantern on your head, or@wearing pumpkin bloomers perhaps...

group_1.textRight: Please use this manga as reference!

group_1.textLeft: The title of this is... "The Pumpkin King and Ghost Servant"?
Ah, this...
I heard you had drawn this, Karin.
It's a manga with a theme of Halloween spirit,@correct?

group_1.textRight: Right on! I'd love it if you gave it a read.

group_1.textLeft: How incredible!@If this isn't the most Halloween thing I've ever seen.

group_1.textRight: Thanks a bunch!

group_1.textLeft: Just as promised,
the characters you modeled after Kushu and@the others are all in it.
Holding that contest was so worth it! â™ª
... Alright then, I'll give it a read so I can get a@clear image.
Let's begin the adjustment.
How's that, I wonder...?

group_1.textRight: [chara:111201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's perfect!@It's just how I imagined!

group_1.textLeft: Hehe, I'm glad!
Just like a king,
it gives off the image of both "ruling" and protecting Halloween.
It suits you so well.

group_1.textRight: Ehehe...@Thank you so very much!

group_1.textLeft: ... And may I add, this manga is really well done.
Not only does it give the impression of Halloween,@but it's also easy to read and very interesting.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad I kept who was reading it in mind@while I drew it.
Alina-senpai's advice made me realize that.

group_1.textLeft: Alina did, huh...

group_1.textRight: Senpai may have a bad mouth, and she may have@done some bad things she doesn't remember,
but I believe she definitely has a kind heart...!
